name: Mekong Delta and Phu Quoc island family vacation
description:
This trip takes your family to the mighty Mekong river,
gives you a real insight and understanding into how life is lived along the
banks and in the Vietnam Delta region. Enjoy authentic cruise on Le Cochinchine
cruise while discovering floating markets, pagodas and local villages. Finally,
enjoy your family holiday on beautiful beach of Phu Quoc Island.
